Title: 11:00 P.M.-12:00 A.M.
Plot: Palmer has had enough of Sherry's power plays and has a final showdown with her in the hotel ballroom. Nina knows that the Drazens have no leverage without Kim, so she calls Jack and tells him that Kim's body was found floating in the harbor. Jack is crushed by grief and then he flies into a rage. He rushes the Drazens and a bloody shoot-out ensues. Nina's cover is blown and she makes a final dash for safety, leaving a bloody trail behind her. Jack is able to apprehend her before she can escape,
GuestStars: Kevin Chapman,  Terrell Tilford,  Rey Gallegos,  Tico Wells,  Endre Hules,  Jane Yamamoto
